# scam.horse — Equestrian & Horse Scam Database

> Community-powered database of equestrian & horse scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the equestrian & horse industry.


scam.horse is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the equestrian & horse industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Equestrian & Horse scam database and community reports](https://scam.horse)


## Keywords

equestrian & horse scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.horse
